label: none
description: No palliative care provided. Diagnosed at autopsy

label: surgery
description: Surgery (which may involve a bypass procedure) performed to alleviate symptoms, but no attempt to diagnose, stage, or treat the tumor is made.

label: radiation
description: Radiation therapy given to alleviate symptoms, but no attempt to produce cure is made.

label: chemotherapy, hormone, or systemic
description: Chemotherapy, hormone therapy, or other systemic drugs given to alleviate symptoms without curative intent.

label: pain management only
description: Patient received or was referred for pain management only.

label: surgery, radiation, chemotherapy, hormone, or systemic; without pain management
description: Any combination of codes 1, 2, and/or 3 without code 4.

label: surgery, radiation, chemotherapy, hormone, or systemic; with pain management
description: Any combination of codes 1, 2, and/or 3 with code 4.

label: unspecified
description: Palliative care was performed or recommended, but no information on the type of procedure is available in the patient record.
